Function Index

decode/1
encode/1URL and filename safe base64 variant with no padding, also known as "base64url" per RFC 4648.

Function Details

decode/1

decode(B::iolist() | binary()) -> binary()

encode/1

encode(B::iolist() | binary()) -> binary()

URL and filename safe base64 variant with no padding, also known as "base64url" per RFC 4648.

This differs from base64 in the following ways: '-' is used in place of '+' (62), '_' is used in place of '/' (63), padding is implicit rather than explicit ('=').
